select d.`NAME` as name, d.HOST_NAME as hostName, d.`PORT` as port, d.DATABASE_NAME as databaseName, t.`CODE` as databaseType, ID_DATABASE as databaseId from r_database d INNER JOIN r_database_type t on d.ID_DATABASE_TYPE=t.ID_DATABASE_TYPE
d.user_group=#{_parameter}

SELECT t.ID_TASK_GROUP_MEMBER_ATTRIBUTE as groupAttributeId, t.TASK_GROUP_NAME as taskGroupName, t.TYPE as type, t.ID_TASK as taskId, t.TASK_NAME as taskName, t.TASK_PATH as taskPath FROM d_task_group_member_attribute t WHERE t.TASK_GROUP_NAME = #{taskGroupName} AND t.TYPE = #{type} AND t.TASK_NAME = #{taskName}

SELECT t.USER_GROUP_NAME, t.TASK_GROUP_NAME, a.TASK_GROUP_NAME, a.ID_TASK, a.TASK_NAME FROM d_user_group_tasks_relation t , d_task_group_member_attribute a WHERE t.TASK_GROUP_NAME = a.TASK_GROUP_NAME AND t.USER_GROUP_NAME = #{taskGroupName} AND a.TYPE = #{type} AND a.TASK_NAME = #{taskName} AND a.ID_TASK = #{taskId}
mapper.update: update r_database set USER_GROUP =#{userGroup} WHERE NAME=#{name} AND HOST_NAME=#{hostName} AND DATABASE_NAME =#{databaseName}
